author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation Limited, Salem region, will operate special buses round the clock from March 22 to 25 for the benefit of devotees visiting temples for Pournami girivalam.

The TNSTC will operate special buses from Salem to Palani (via Erode and Kangeyam); Namakkal to Palani (via Karur); Namakkal to Palani (via Kodumudi); Salem to Vada Sennimalai (via Attur); Kallakurichi to Vada Sennimalai; Dharmapuri to Palani and Salem to Tiruvannamalai.
title: Special bus service for girivalam
